title: How do I turn off phone quality feedback notifications on Pixel3a?
content:
After I finish a phone call, often the Phone App will show the following notification: 

How was the quality of your call with XXXX? 
We'll use your feedback to improve.
Bad        Good      Turn these off

Turn these off doesn't work.

How do  I stop these from appearing?  When I look in the Phone App notification settings, it doesn't look I can make any changes, as the slider button is grayed out.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
